owner_summaries.key_concerns: Entity-level TB balances not zero, high flux analysis exceptions
High number of AP and AR reconciliation exceptions

residual_risks.description: Entity-level trial balance discrepancies could lead to misstated financials
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Implement automated reconciliation tools and enhance review processes

residual_risks.description: High number of flux analysis exceptions indicating potential data integrity issues
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Conduct detailed variance analysis and improve data validation checks

residual_risks.description: AP and AR reconciliation exceptions may lead to compliance issues
residual_risks.mitigation_recommendations: Strengthen reconciliation procedures and increase frequency of reviews
